figure.head: FIG.
figure.figDesc:
T dependence of ρ ab of the BSLCO crystals. Inset:
Tc as a function of La content x. The dashed lines are guide
to the eyes.

figure.head: FIG.
figure.figDesc:
T dependence of the slope dρ ab /dT . The dashed
line represents a constant slope (T -linear behavior). Inset:
Plot of log(ρ ab -ρ0) vs log T for three x values to show the
power-law dependence ρ ab =ρ0 + AT n , which is represented
by dotted lines.

figure.head: FIG.
figure.figDesc:
(a) T dependence of RH of the BSLCO crystals.
(b) Plot of cot θH vs T 2 (the data for x=0.30 and 0.24 are
shifted down by 50 and 100, respectively, to avoid congestion).
The solid line is a fit to the x=0.66 data.

figure.head: FIG.
figure.figDesc:
Plots of cot θH vs T α for the data of (a) x=0.57,
(b) x=0.44, (c) x=0.30, and (d) x=0.24. The solid lines are
fits to the data.
